Class TicketingController

java.lang.Object
com.ticketing.RealimeTicketingSystem_backend.Controller.TicketingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") public class TicketingController extends Object
REST Controller that handles API endpoints for the Real-Time Ticketing System.

  • Method Details

    • saveConfiguration

      @PostMapping("/configuration") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Configuration> saveConfiguration(@RequestBody Configuration config)
      Endpoint to save configuration in the database.
      Parameters:
      config - (Configuration object to be saved)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with saved Configuration object

    • getConfiguration

      @GetMapping("/configuration") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Configuration> getConfiguration()
      Endpoint to get the latest configuration from the database.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the latest Configuration object

    • startSimulation

      @PostMapping("/simulation/start") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation using the latest configuration Gets the latest configuration from the database. Starts the simulation using the latest configuration. Else, returns bad request if no configuration is found.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure.

    • stopSimulation

      @PostMapping("/simulation/stop") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> stopSimulation()
      Stops the simulation Stops the simulation by setting isRunning to false.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success.
